filter.name: general
filter.aql: name $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.place.of.interest:cataloging/name) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:description/description) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@object-irn) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(emu:record/irn) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@registration-number) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.digital.asset:production/job-ids/id) $${op}$$ '$${value}$$'
